title: Lobby Chat Blocked
body:
For some reason, Whenever i enter A game, i try to say something like "hello" or "ban (champ name)" but when i press enter, nothing loads, and after a little bit, it just says "You are blocked from sending messages in this chat room". Same thing with the post-game lobby screen. The chat is blank, it doesnt even say "TheGoblinMaster joined the room." it's just blank, and it also says that nobody is even there to begin with and all the names or grey. Please help!
Edit: This is Legacy Client

replies.body: Do you often say similar things when you type in chat? Sometimes the filter can mistakenly think they're spamming a lot if you often type the same thing (example: "mid" or "ban kat"). Try changing up what you're typing into chat and let me know if this caused any difference in what you're seeing.
